name: azurecurve RSS Feed
author: azurecurve

sections.description:
Provides opposite rss feed to that configured in WordPress; e.g. if WordPress is configured for summary then an alternative feed called detail will be created, or if WordPress is configured for a detailed feed then an alternative feed called summary is created.

Once active, both summary and detail feeds cab be access using the following paths:
* http://yourdomain/feed/detail
* http://yourdomain/feed/summary
sections.installation: To install the plugin copy the azurcurve-rss-feed folder into your plug-in directory and activate it.
sections.faq:
Is this plugin compatible with both WordPress and ClassicPress?

  • Yes, this plugin will work with both.
sections.changelog:
Changes and feature additions for the RSS Feed plugin:

2.0.2

  • Move menu to includes folder for easier maintenance

2.0.1

  • Correct issue with if exists azurecurve menu

2.0.0

  • Add new azurecurve menu

1.0.0

  • First version
